item.description:
The Savage Brothers, a Hartford based band established in 1984, is a 6 piece funkin’, rockin’, and rhythm group. The band features a two piece horn section and three brothers of the same last name….Savage.

www.savagebrothersband.com

If you get there by 8-8:30 not usually a cover charge, band plays at 9:30 ish -- This will be a fun night

see you all soon, if you want to meet for dinner first please email or put in message info.

Nancy
item.how_to_find_us: this will be fun -- dancing or playing pool

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Savage Brothers
